new cost definition log:

[

twitter_weights=np.log10(w.full()[0]+epsilon)

cost[i][j]=pow(10,8)*pow(float(distance[i][j]),beta)/(float(attraction[i])*float(attraction[j]))/twitter_weights[i][j]

]
